title: International rankings of Iran
data: In 2018 Iran produced 60268 documents in all fields . Iran is ranked 8th in the field of pharmacology , toxicology and pharmaceutics . 9th in the field of chemical engineering.10th in the field of material science . 12th in the field of mathematics . 12th in the field of chemistry . 12th in the field of engineering . 14th in the field of agriculture and biological science . 14th in the field of physics and astronomy . 16th in the field of medicine . 17th in the field of biochemistry , genetics and monocular biology . 17th in the field of computer science . 12th in the field of energy
Index measures enabling environment for innovation ; More info : Ingenuity & Creativity
Science-Metrix Report / Science-Metrix country graph comparison / Government of United Kingdom

Highest science & technology growth rate in the world , 1000% increase in 9 years ( 1995-2004 ) ; Iran has increased its academic publishing output from 0.0003% of world 's total output in 1970 to 0.29% by 2004 ( That is ~100000% growth in 33 years ) , by 2008 Iran 's share had reached 1.02% of the world 's total output ( ~340000% growth in 37 years ) ; Iran 's 2009 growth rate in science & technology was highest globally being 11 times faster than the world 's average rate ; Iran has been doubling its scientific output every 3 years ; In 2009 ranked at 22nd by total scientific output ; 19th in mathematics output , 17th in computer science applications output , 15th in nuclear technology output ; 28th in physics output ; 16th in aerospace technology output ; 17th in medicine output , 13th in chemistry output & 15th in nanotechnology output More info : Science in newly industrialized countries ; Iranian scientific publications online digital archive
Total Research & Development spending in PPP US dollars

Iran spends 6.2 billion US dollars in PPP terms equaling to ~0.7% of its GDP ( PPP ) , Iran has 500 scientists & tech personnel working in R & D sector for every one million of population ; More info : Iran National Science Foundation & Science of science policy & Science policy & Technology Life Cycle & Iranian cities among world 's science cities
About 0.5% of GDP was spent on research and development in year 2000 ; Iran 's spending on R & D is to reach 3% of GDP by 2015 ; Government funds 75% of all Research in Iran
Research and development spending per capita
0.007351% of national GDP per 1 million people ; More info : Emerging technologies

Technology Achievement Index measures creation of technology , diffusion of recent innovations , diffusion of old innovations & human skills ; Iran 's score : 0.26 out of 1 ; Iran ranks 1st in the region , 4th in Asia and 12th in the world in producing biological drugs . More info : Human capital
0.014702 Patents per one million people ; More info : Intellectual property in Iran & Technological determinism
ISA with $ 500 million/Year has the 9th highest budget of a national space organization in the world
Timeline of first orbital launches by country
Iran is the 9th country to reach space ; More info : Outer Space Treaty
Iran is the sixth country to have launched animals into space & recover them alive
Total human spaceflight time by country

Iran stands 21st in terms of total time spent by its nationals in space ; Only one Iranian ( Anousheh Ansari ) has spent ~11 person-days in space as a space tourist ; More info : Timeline of space travel by nationality
